overview:
Ilene Adler is the founder and CEO of Vantage Communications. Founded in 1990, the agency is dedicated to promoting technology.

Drawing from nearly thirty years of technology experience, Ilene has effectively kept domestic and international clients ahead of the curve and reaching their objectives. In addition to overseeing the general management of the company, Ilene drives the PR strategy for clients and is actively involved in accounts.

Prior to Vantage, Ilene was President of RAD Data Communication, Inc. where she built the company and sales force in the U.S., and spearheaded major OEM sales. She started with RAD as Director of International Sales & Marketing.
